page.title: 17FASHIONS
page.content: There are a lot of different fashions that are popular at the moment. Probably the most unusual is the punk style. Some punks dress that way just because they like the clothes or because they like particular pop groups that dress that way. Others belong to gangs and frighten people. There are some punks that hang out at the railway station and on street corners. They wear leather and chains, knuckle dusters, weird hairstyles with different colours, poison signs on their jackets and initials (e.g.:GBH - 'Grievious Bodily Harm'). Some are very nice people but others are vandals that swear and smash litter bins and park benches. They use pen, pencil, crayon, paint and spray paint to infest our walls with graffitti. Most punks are teenagers. Some are at school, some work,some are unemployed.
